hero.headline: End-to-end enterprise UX.
hero.subtitle: From initial discovery through design systems and ongoing support. We bring deep expertise in industrial and enterprise experience design.

phases.heading: Discovery & Research
phases.description: Understanding your world before we design. Field visits, user interviews, workflow mapping, and contextual analysis.

services.title: Contextual Inquiry
services.description: On-site observation of your users and workflows in their actual environment — offshore platforms, control rooms, field sites.

services.title: User Interviews
services.description: Deep conversations with operators, managers, and decision-makers about their needs and pain points.

services.title: Workflow Mapping
services.description: Detailed documentation of how work actually happens (not how you think it happens).

services.title: Usability Testing
services.description: Quantitative task-based testing to measure completion rates, time-on-task, and error frequency.

phases.heading: Strategy & Design
phases.description: Creating the vision and bringing it to life. Conceptual frameworks, interaction design, and visual systems.

services.title: Product Strategy
services.description: Defining scope, phasing, and roadmap aligned with business goals and user needs.

services.title: Information Architecture
services.description: Organizing complex information into intuitive mental models. Critical for legacy consolidation.

services.title: Interaction Design
services.description: Designing how users interact with the system at every touchpoint — optimized for real working conditions.

services.title: Data Visualization
services.description: Complex data made clear. From fracturing metrics to seismic interpretation to grid monitoring.

phases.heading: Implementation & Scale
phases.description: Building sustainable systems that work across organizations. Design systems, development support, and capability building.

services.title: Design Systems
services.description: Component libraries, design tokens, and documentation for consistent implementation at scale.

services.title: Development Support
services.description: Design QA during implementation, iteration based on developer feedback, production asset delivery.

services.title: Embedded Partnership
services.description: Dedicated design pod embedded with your product team. Sprint-aligned delivery, continuous improvement.

services.title: Training & Capability Building
services.description: Training internal teams on UX methodology so they can maintain and extend design standards independently.

phases.heading: Agentic Experience Design
phases.description: Next-generation human-AI collaboration for enterprise environments. We design the interface between people and intelligent systems.

services.title: AI Interface Design
services.description: Designing how users interact with AI systems — from autonomous agents to decision-support tools.

services.title: Agentic Workflow Design
services.description: Defining the hand-off points between human judgment and automated action in complex operational systems.

services.title: Spatial Computing Concepts
services.description: Next-generation interface exploration for Vision Pro and spatial computing environments.

services.title: AI System Visualization
services.description: Translating complex AI architectures and data flows into clear, compelling visual communication.

cards.name: Energy & Utilities
cards.description: Oil, gas, nuclear, renewables. From exploration to operations to grid management.

cards.name: Oilfield Services
cards.description: Field operations, data management, mobile tools for demanding oilfield environments.

cards.name: Industrial Software
cards.description: B2B platforms, geoscience tools, production optimization software.

cards.name: Financial Services
cards.description: Credit unions, banking, insurance — member experience at scale with regulatory complexity.

cta.heading: Let's talk about your enterprise software challenge.
cta.body: Whether you need a complete platform redesign, field research, or an embedded design partner — we've been here before.
